name: Chicco Next2Me Forever
longDesc: More than a co-sleeper. Evolves with your baby up to 4 years. Patented folding side panel for maximum safety, wheels for moving, and Montessori floor bed mode.

name: Ecus Kids Pingu Mattress
shortDesc: The most recommended anti-suffocation crib mattress.
longDesc: Scientifically designed to prevent plagiocephaly and suffocation. Its core with air channels reduces pressure on baby's head and ensures breathing even if they roll over.

name: Tommee Tippee Grobag 2.5 TOG
shortDesc: Premium sleeping bag for absolute thermal safety.
longDesc: The gold standard in sleeping bags. Ergonomic design for healthy hips (IHDI), easy night diaper changes with double zipper, and luxury cotton fabric.

name: Love To Dream Swaddle UP
shortDesc: The only swaddle that allows sleeping with arms up.
longDesc: Revolutionary design allowing baby to sleep in their natural position (arms up) to self-soothe, while preventing startle reflex. Thousands of parents 'saved'.

name: Hatch Rest 2nd Gen
longDesc: Combines smart white noise machine, night light, and audio monitor. All controlled from your phone. Create custom sleep routines that grow with your child.

name: Portable Blackout Curtains
longDesc: Turns any room into a sleep cave. Attaches to window with premium suction cups. Essential for vacations or visiting family.

name: Nanit Pro Smart Monitor
shortDesc: The Tesla of baby monitors. Computer vision for sleep.
longDesc: Not just see your baby, but analyze their sleep. Gives data on sleep duration, night visits, and breathing (with special band). Unmatched HD video quality.

name: Levoit Dual 150 Humidifier
shortDesc: Absolute silence and precise humidity control.
longDesc: Amazon's favorite humidifier. Ultrasonic technology almost inaudible (28dB), easy to clean tank (large opening), and rotating nozzle. Vital for colds.

name: Nosiboo Pro Nasal Aspirator
longDesc: The ultimate nasal aspirator. Design award winner. Adjustable strong suction to clear noses in seconds when no other aspirator can.

name: GroEgg 2 Thermometer
shortDesc: Visual safety. Changes color with temperature.
longDesc: At a glance know if the room is safe. Yellow (perfect), Blue (cold), Red (hot). Also acts as a perfect dim pleasant night light.

name: VAVA Night Light
longDesc: Portable, rechargeable, and with warm light that doesn't wake baby up. Perfect for night feeds and diaper changes. SOS mode and safe surface for baby to play.

name: Bibs De Lux Pacifiers
shortDesc: The renewed Danish classic. Style and acceptance.
longDesc: Round nipple mimics mother's nipple, with iconic vintage aesthetic and premium matte finishes. Curved shield to avoid irritating skin around mouth.

name: Jané Nursing Pillow
longDesc: A trusted classic. Filled with microspheres that adapt to your body and baby's. Use for pregnancy, breastfeeding, and as a baby lounge nest.

name: Songmics Nursing Chair
shortDesc: Bestselling rocker for comfort and price.
longDesc: No need to spend 600€. This birch rocker offers the perfect sway and adjustable footrest. Thousands of moms recommend it for night feeds.

name: BabyBjörn Harmony
shortDesc: The luxury carrier. Super soft 3D mesh.
longDesc: The ultimate carrier from newborn to 3 years. Tech 3D mesh prevents overheating. Superior lumbar support and certified ergonomic hip design.

name: BabyBjörn Travel Crib Light
shortDesc: Sets up in 1 move. Maximum lightness.
longDesc: The best travel crib on the market, hands down. Weighs only 6kg and unfolds magically in a second. Comfy mattress included (not a board) and carry bag.

name: Munchkin Portable Changer
longDesc: Compact and stylish. Includes head pad, mesh pocket for diapers, and wipes case. Everything you need in a clutch bag.

name: Carter's 2-Way Zip Pajamas
shortDesc: The #1 American pajamas for quality and fit.
longDesc: Famous for their designs and durability. The 2-way zipper is standard on all models, making life easier for parents at every diaper change.

name: Goodnight Moon
shortDesc: The classic bedtime story for generations.
longDesc: In a great green room, tucked away in bed, is a little bunny. 'Goodnight room, goodnight moon.' The quiet poetry and gentle illustrations make it the perfect end-of-day book.

name: Stokke Flexi Bath + Support
shortDesc: The Norwegian folding tub that saves space.
longDesc: Iconic design that folds completely flat. With the optional newborn support, it's the perfect solution for safe and comfortable baths without taking up the whole bathroom.

name: Weleda Calendula Oil
shortDesc: The liquid gold for baby's skin.
longDesc: Certified natural cosmetics. Soothes skin and envelops baby in a thermal protective layer. The gentle scent is relaxing and perfect for post-bath massage.

name: Sophie La Girafe
shortDesc: The world's most famous teether since 1961.
longDesc: Made of 100% natural rubber and food paint. Stimulates all 5 senses. Its legs and ears are perfect for soothing sore gums. An essential gift.

name: Aden+Anais Fitted Sheets
shortDesc: Luxury muslin that gets softer with every wash.
longDesc: Cotton muslin is the most breathable fabric for babies. These sheets are not only beautiful but regulate temperature better than regular cotton.

name: Galetoss Pilates Ball
shortDesc: Sturdy and safe for bouncing with baby.
longDesc: Thick anti-burst material. Essential for soothing colic through gentle bouncing. A lifesaver for parents with high-demand babies.

name: Munchkin Diaper Organizer
longDesc: Keep chaos under control. Space for dozens of diapers, wipes, and creams. Sturdy handle to carry the 'change hq' to any room.

name: Owlet Dream Sock
shortDesc: Total peace of mind monitoring vitals.
longDesc: Hospital tech at home. Measures oxygen and pulse while sleeping. Alerts base and phone if levels drop, allowing you to sleep with true peace of mind.

name: Nanny Breathing Monitor
shortDesc: The most reliable medically certified monitor.
longDesc: Used in maternity wards across Europe. A large surface sensor mat detects every micro-breath. If it stops for 20s, a loud acoustic alarm sounds.

name: Philips 800 Series Purifier
shortDesc: Pure allergen-free air in total silence.
longDesc: Compact size ideal for bedrooms. Its sleep mode is ultra-quiet and light-free. Removes viruses, allergens, and dust in minutes thanks to its HEPA filter.

name: Dyson Purifier Cool Autoreact
shortDesc: The jewel in purification and cooling.
longDesc: Captures dust, allergens, and H1N1 virus. Bladeless fan (100% safe for little fingers) and monitors air quality in real-time. A luxury that improves health.

name: GroClock Sleep Trainer
longDesc: The sun comes up on screen only when it's time to get up. Kids understand the concept visually and stay in bed until 'the sun comes up', gifting you hours of sleep.

name: Tommee Tippee Twist & Click
shortDesc: The only bin that twists and wraps each nappy individually.
longDesc: Guaranteed protection against odors. Its system twists and seals each diaper in antibacterial film, blocking germs and smells. Essential if you change in the bedroom.

name: Prince Lionheart Wipe Warmer
shortDesc: Wipes always moist and warm, never dry.
longDesc: Patented system prevents them from drying out or turning brown. Maintains the perfect temperature to clean baby's bum without night startles.

name: Philips Avent Bottle Warmer
longDesc: Calculates exact time based on volume and starting temperature. Heats evenly without dangerous hot spots and keeps milk warm for up to 1 hour.

name: MAM Milk Dispenser
shortDesc: Triangular design to not spill a gram.
longDesc: Seemingly simple, but its triangular shape makes it easy to pour all powder into narrow-neck bottles without clogging. Leak-proof lids and medical grade material.

name: Haakaa Manual Breast Pump
longDesc: Uses the let-down reflex while breastfeeding. Attaches by suction and collects milk effectively. One piece, silent, no cords.

name: Glocusent Reading Light
longDesc: Designed for readers, adopted by moms. 3 light tones (including amber sleep-friendly). Eternal battery and perfect directionality to not disturb your partner.

name: 3 Sprouts Organizer
longDesc: Brightens the room while organizing. Sturdy structure that doesn't deform. Perfect for diapers, lotions, and emergency wipes.

name: Medela Freestyle Hands-Free
longDesc: The most advanced hospital-grade hands-free pump. Worn inside the bra. Compact motor in pocket. Reclaim hours of your life while pumping.

name: Burt's Bees Fleece Jumpsuit
shortDesc: Organic cotton and recycled polyester soft.
longDesc: The eco-friendly brand par excellence. Its fleece jumpsuit is famous for being warm but not stifling, ideal for babies who kick off blankets.

name: Tommee Tippee Groblind
longDesc: Fits any window up to 130x198cm. Long-lasting suction cups that don't fall off mid-nap. Essential for summer and travel.

name: BSensible Protective Sheet
longDesc: Natural dermoprotective fabric (Tencel/Zinc) that is waterproof but breathes like a second skin. Forget noisy plastics. Quality made in Spain.

name: Norit Baby Detergent
longDesc: Recommended by dermatologists/pediatricians. Formula without sensitizing preservatives. Keeps clothes soft without softener (which shouldn't be used for babies).

name: MAM Clip It!
longDesc: One of the few clips that allows length adjustment for sleeping safety. Compatible with button, ring, and teethers. Sturdy design.

name: Lorena Canals Washable Rug
shortDesc: Cotton rugs washable in washing machine.
longDesc: The revolution in kids' decor. Vomit or stain? Into the washer and ready. 100% natural cotton and non-toxic dyes. Beautiful designs and soft touch.

name: Loop Quiet Earplugs
longDesc: Soft-touch silicone super comfy for side sleeping. Reduces 26dB (snoring/street noise) but allows you to hear a loud cry or alarm next to you.

name: MantaSilk Sleep Mask
shortDesc: 100% Mulberry silk protecting skin and sleep.
longDesc: Grade 6A silk (highest). Blocks light totally and is anti-wrinkle. Elastic doesn't squeeze hair. A small luxury to improve your naps.

name: Banbaloo Bed Bumper
longDesc: Better than ugly metal rails. A viscoelastic foam cylinder placed under the sheet. Stops the child gently without 'cage' feeling.

name: Baby Shusher Original
longDesc: Used by newborn photographers. Emits a rhythmic and loud 'SHHHHH' that activates the calming reflex. 15/30min timer and necessary high volume.

name: Jellycat Bunny
shortDesc: London's softest and most luxurious plush.
longDesc: A modern classic. Its fabric is indescribably soft. Safe from birth and so durable it will become their childhood companion.

name: Beaba Stainless Steel Jar
longDesc: Double wall stainless steel. Keeps food hot 5h or cold 7h. Wide mouth to eat directly from and 100% airtight lid with handle.

name: Rockit Rocker (Rechargeable)
shortDesc: The rocket that rocks the stroller automatically.
longDesc: A godsend for stops at traffic lights or cafes. Attaches to any stroller and rocks it gently so baby doesn't wake up. Silent, adjustable speed, and now USB rechargeable.

name: Lamaze Freddie the Firefly
shortDesc: Complete sensory toy for early development.
longDesc: Stimulates sight, hearing, and touch. Wings with different textures, self-discovery mirror, rattles, and teether. The perfect stroller toy.

name: Manhattan Toy Winkel
shortDesc: The labyrinth design rattle and teether.
longDesc: Easy to grasp for tiny hands. Its soft color tubes can be cooled in the fridge to soothe gums. Hypnotic for babies.

name: VTech Crawl Ball
shortDesc: Encourages baby to chase it and crawl.
longDesc: Moves by itself randomly encouraging baby to follow. Lights, songs, and animals teaching basic vocabulary while developing gross motor skills.

name: Mushie Stacking Cups
shortDesc: Nordic style for fine motor skills.
longDesc: Danish design stacking cups in soft colors. Ideal for tower, bath, or beach. Helps hand-eye coordination without overstimulating.

name: Mega Bloks Building Bag
longDesc: The ideal first building set. Large blocks impossible to swallow and easy to fit/separate. Fosters creativity and fine motor skills.

name: VTech Baby Walker
shortDesc: Activity center and support for first steps.
longDesc: Removable activity panel for floor play and sturdy walker to gain confidence walking. Speed control on wheels for safety.

name: Magna-Tiles 32 Pieces
longDesc: The ultimate toy investment. Translucent pieces that magnetically join on any side. Math, geometry, and creativity in one durable toy.

name: Melissa & Doug Sound Puzzle
longDesc: Place the correct piece (e.g., cow) to hear the realistic animal sound. Reinforces cause-effect, vocabulary, and fine motor skills.

name: Montessori Munari Mobile
longDesc: The first Montessori mobile. High contrast black and white geometric shapes balanced on a glass sphere to reflect light. Perfect for developing focus and tracking.

name: High Contrast Cards
longDesc: Black and white patterned cards designed for baby's developing vision. Stimulates brain growth and visual attention during tummy time.

name: Wooden Play Gym
longDesc: Simple wooden structure to hang tactile mobiles. Promotes freedom of movement and concentration without overstimulation of battery toys.

name: Interlocking Discs
longDesc: Two wooden discs joined together. Unique shape encourages baby to pass object from one hand to another and rotate wrists.

name: Rolling Bell Rattle
longDesc: A cylinder with a bell inside. When rolling, emits a pleasant sound, encouraging baby to turn head and eventually crawl towards it.

name: Sensory Balls Set
longDesc: A set of balls with different textures, sizes, and weights. Perfect for sensory exploration and developing grip strength.

name: Wrist Rattles
longDesc: Soft rattles that adjust to wrists or ankles. Helps baby discover their own limbs and understand they control the movement causing sound.

name: Object Permanence Box
longDesc: Wooden box with hole and tray. Baby drops the ball and it reappears. Teaches that objects continue to exist even if unseen (object permanence).

name: Spinning Drum
longDesc: A spinning drum with colors and mirror. Spinning it requires a specific wrist movement and produces visual and auditory reward.

name: Egg in Cup
longDesc: A wooden egg and a custom cup. Placing the egg in the cup and removing it refines grasp and release skills.

name: Treasure Basket
longDesc: A low basket filled with safe everyday objects of various materials (wood, metal, leather, brush). Fosters independent exploration.

name: Ball Tracker
longDesc: A wooden tower where balls fall in zigzag. Hypnotic for babies, teaches gravity and visual tracking of objects in movement.

name: Pop-Up Toy
longDesc: Classic cause-effect where different buttons (push, switch, turn) make animals pop up. Great for finger strength and problem solving.

name: Geometric Sorter
longDesc: More than a sorter. Teaches colors, counting (1 to 4 holes), and basic geometry. Made of solid wood.

name: Pound & Tap Bench
longDesc: Baby hammers balls, they fall and roll over the xylophone creating music. Later the xylophone can be removed for separate play.

name: Barnyard Activity Cube
longDesc: Award-winning wooden cube. Includes bead maze, animal rotators, and sorters. Perfect height for sitting or kneeling.

name: Baby Stella Doll
longDesc: Soft doll with magnetic pacifier. Sized for toddlers. Simple features encourage imagination and 'caring' role play.

name: Pikler Triangle
longDesc: Foldable climbing triangle. Encourages free movement, climbing, and balance at the child's own pace. A Montessori gym essential at home.

name: Wooden Balance Board
longDesc: Is it a bridge? A tunnel? A slide? A rocker? The balance board develops vestibular system and is infinitely creatively used.

name: Realistic Animal Figures
longDesc: High quality realistic animals. Essential for vocabulary and matching games with real animal photos or flashcards.

name: Cleaning Set
longDesc: Toddlers love to mimic parents. A functional broom, mop, and duster set sized for them. Fosters independence and contributing to home life.

name: Play Kitchen
longDesc: Simple wooden kitchen. Encourages symbolic play, cooking 'recipes', and social interaction. Neutral design fits any living room.

name: Pattern Blocks
longDesc: Wooden tessellation shapes. Kids create patterns, animals, or mosaics. Develops spatial awareness and geometry intuition.

name: Water Blocks
longDesc: Blocks filled with colored water/sand. Beautiful visual effects when building against light. Adds sensory dimension to construction.

name: Play Silk Scarf
longDesc: A large silk scarf is a cape, a lake, a roof for a fort, or a peek-a-boo tool. The ultimate open-ended toy.

name: Magnifying Glass
longDesc: A sturdy magnifying glass for little hands. Turns every walk into a scientific expedition looking for bugs and leaves.

name: Kinetic Sand
longDesc: Mesmerizing texture that flows like liquid but holds shape. Perfect for indoor sensory play without the mess of real sand.

name: Bee-Hive Matching
longDesc: Wooden bees to be placed in their color-matching hives using wooden tweezers. Excellent for pre-writing pincer grasp.

name: Wooden Calendar & Clock
longDesc: Visual wooden board with slider for days, months, seasons, and clock. Helps visualize abstract concept of time.

name: Color Sorting Bowls
longDesc: Simple bowls and tokens/acorns. Sorting by color is a precursor to mathematical logic and organizing abilities.

name: The Whole-Brain Child
shortDesc: Revolutionary strategies to nurture your child's developing mind.
longDesc: Daniel J. Siegel and Tina Payne Bryson offer 12 key strategies that foster healthy brain development, leading to calmer, happier children.

name: How to Talk So Kids Will Listen
longDesc: Adele Faber and Elaine Mazlish provide practical and respectful methods to solve common conflicts and build lasting relationship foundations.

name: No-Drama Discipline
shortDesc: The whole-brain way to calm the chaos.
longDesc: Siegel and Bryson highlight the link between a child's neurological development and the way parents react to misbehavior, promoting connection.

name: The Montessori Toddler
shortDesc: Turn your home into a Montessori paradise.
longDesc: Simone Davies shows how to turn life with a toddler into a rich and rewarding time of curiosity, learning, respect, and discovery.

name: What to Expect the First Year
longDesc: Heidi Murkoff's essential guide covers everything from care and feeding to sleep and development. The bible for new parents.
